title: ADC Main LF Ranked 5's Team
body:
Hello to whom reads this,

I'm a GOLD 1 ADC Main looking for a serious team who wants to progress.

Little information about me:

I've been playing league of legends since Season 3, I have great game knowledge and awareness. I can play ANY  ADC, Aggressive/Passive.
I also enjoy shot-calling, or if you need a backup. I have Teamspeak/Discord and I also have a Mic.
Pretty easy to get along with, I'm a relaxed person. I'm 22, AUS just so you know I'm not a squeaker. 
I will accept Criticism, if I do a bad play call me on it. How else do we become better.

I'm online everyday, usally from 3pm-11pm. If you think I would be suited for your team, send me "Shiney" an Add on the League of Legends client.

(I Also have a friend who is Silver 2 and Mains support, hes online everyday Like me. We have good Botlane Synergy if you need the Role to be filled.)

{{champion:51}}

replies.body: Add me and message me bro.
